text: Epidirona is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. This genus is considered by WoRMS as a synonym of Epideira Hedley, 1918 ==Species== Species within the genus Epidirona include: * Epidirona beachportensis (Cotton & Godfrey, 1938) * Epidirona candida Laseron, 1954 * Epidirona carinata Laseron, 1954 * Epidirona costifera Laseron, 1954 * Epidirona flindersi (Cotton & Godfrey, 1938) * Epidirona hedleyi Iredale, 1931 * Epidirona molleri Laseron, 1954 * Epidirona multiseriata (Smith E. A., 1877) * Epidirona nodulosa Laseron, 1954 * Epidirona perksi (Verco, 1896) * Epidirona philipineri (Tenison-Woods, 1877) * Epidirona quoyi (Desmoulins, 1842) * Epidirona schoutanica (May, 1911) * Epidirona torquata (Hedley, 1922) * Epidirona tuberculata Laseron, 1954 * Epidirona xanthophaes (Watson, 1886) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Pseudomelatomidae
title: Epidirona
